        public static byte[] dump(Class clazz,
          String className,
          List fields,
          List methods,
          Handler handler)
        Return the proxy 'classname' for the contract 'contractname' by delegating on available service.
        Parameters:
        clazz - : Specification class
        className - : The class name to create
        fields - : the list of fields on which delegate
        methods - : the list of method on which delegate
        handler - : handler object used to access the logger
        Returns:
        byte[] : the build class
